snippet: Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, expressed dismay over a defiant speech on Sunday by President Bashar al-Assad of Syria.
abstract: United Nations Sec Gen Ban Ki-moon expresses dismay over defiant speech by Syrian Pres Bashar al-Assad in which Assad justified his attempts to crush nearly two-year-old uprising against him, ignored demands that he step down and declared that his opponents were foreign puppets.
lead_paragraph: Ban Ki-moon, the United Nations secretary general, expressed dismay over a defiant speech on Sunday by President Bashar al-Assad of Syria.
